interface.description:
A Media Directory device or node contains subnodes representing different media items in the media directory catalog.
* Nodes implementing a `urn:nfi:iot:hi:media:directory:audioItem:*` interface represent audio items in the directory. * Nodes implementing a `urn:nfi:iot:hi:media:directory:directoryItem:*` interface represent possibly multi-resolution or multi-format directory items in the directory. * Nodes implementing a `urn:nfi:iot:hi:media:directory:imageItem:*` interface represent images in the directory. * Nodes implementing a `urn:nfi:iot:hi:media:directory:videoItem:*` interface represent video items in the directory.
Also, items in the directory can also implement a `urn:nfi:iot:hi:media:directory:dublinCore:*` interface to aggregate Dublin Core meta-data for each item.

parametrizedQuery.name: Search
parametrizedQuery.description: This query command allows clients to search for content in the media directory.
parametrizedQuery.comment: The Query command can have any search parameters in its parameter form. The form should however include parameters corresponding to media items available in the directory, but can also include additional search parameters. The query result must include one table with Table ID `SearchResult`. This table can have any number of result columns. One of these columns must have Column ID `NodeId` and point to the corresponding node with the corresponding media interface matching the search parameters.
